# Overall Benefit: Training and support is available for users

The AnVIL team provides and maintains [training materials](https://hutchdatascience.org/AnVIL_Collection/) and documentation in multiple formats (ex: [https://jhudatascience.org/AnVIL_Book_Getting_Started/](https://jhudatascience.org/AnVIL_Book_Getting_Started/)), hosts workshops (ex: [https://anvilproject.org/events/anvil2024-nhgri-intramural-workshop](https://anvilproject.org/events/anvil2024-nhgri-intramural-workshop))and [demos](https://hutchdatascience.org/AnVIL_Demos/) (ex: [https://anvilproject.org/events/anvil2023-december-demos](https://anvilproject.org/events/anvil2023-december-demos)), and moderates a [support forum](https://help.anvilproject.org/) to equip researchers and students to work on the AnVIL.
